name: Scramble (itch) (Victor Ribeiro)
description:
Scramble is a simple yet fun game where you need to put the numbers in the right sequence by shifting their position, until they are all in the correct location.

The correct sequence is from the top to the bottom, from left to right in a crescent order.

| 1 | 2 | 3 |
| 4 | 5 | 6 |
| 7 | 8 | __|

The button scramble, as the name says, scramble the numbers. The drop down selector next to it selects how big is the board: 3x3, 4x4 or 5x5.

Have fun!
